subject: Discrimination
Automobile Racing
Sexual Harassment
Suits and Litigation
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A former racing official has sued Nascar, alleging that she was racially and sexually discriminated against in her two years working for the organization.
snippet: A former racing official has sued Nascar, alleging that she was racially and sexually discriminated against in her two years working for the organization.
